name: GOLD
description: The government open language for design website.

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p src/assets/css/ && node-sass --output-style compressed -o src/assets/css src/sass/style.scss
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs src/assets/js/header.js --compres --output src/assets/js/header.js && uglifyjs src/assets/js/footer.js --compres --output src/assets/js/footer.js
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p src/assets/js/ && npm run build:js-header && npm run build:js-footer && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:assets: npm run build:css && npm run build:autoprefix && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:site
scripts.watch:sass: onchange 'src/sass/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:css && npm run build:autoprefix
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:sass | npm run watch:js | npm run watch:site

site.doctype: <!DOCTYPE html><!--[if lt IE 8]><html class="no-js lt-ie8 lt-ie9" lang="en"><![endif]--><!--[if IE 8]><html class="no-js lt-ie9 ie8" lang="en"><![endif]--><!--[if IE 9 ]><html class="no-js ie9" lang="en"><![endif]--><!--[if !(IE)]><!--><html class="no-js" lang="en"><!--<![endif]-->
